title: Media Server Persistance
body:
### Context

An undesired behavior was identified in our deployment of the Media Server resulting in a lack of persistence of config file when changes were made via the CloudTAK Interface.

Requests to the Media Server for both write and read clients will fail.

### Resolved

This issue has been resolved with the deployment of a persistance script which will run every 10s and persist the API paths to the on-disk config file

Ref: https://github.com/dfpc-coe/media-infra/pull/5
